meta.source: Thailand Bureau of the Budget (draft release)

children.name: Ministry of Finance
children.desc: Stewardship of fiscal, monetary and revenue policy, including public debt management and oversight of state financial institutions.

children.name: Ministry of Education
children.desc: Advances lifelong learning, school quality, teacher development, and access to higher and vocational education.

children.name: Office of the Basic Education Commission
Ministry of Public Health
children.desc: Protects public health, manages hospital networks, and funds national health security and disease control programmes.

children.name: Ministry of Transport
children.desc: Invests in national transport corridors, rail modernisation, and safe multimodal connectivity across Thailand.

children.name: Ministry of Defence
children.desc: Funds the Royal Thai Armed Forces, strategic readiness, and long-term defence procurement programmes.

children.name: Ministry of Interior
children.desc: Coordinates provincial administration, disaster preparedness, and grants to local governments and municipalities.

children.name: Department of Disaster Prevention and Mitigation
Ministry of Agriculture and Cooperatives
children.desc: Supports farmers with irrigation, research, extension services, and resilient agricultural value chains.

children.name: Ministry of Higher Education, Science, Research and Innovation
children.desc: Drives innovation, university competitiveness, and strategic research supporting new growth industries.

children.name: Ministry of Justice
children.desc: Maintains rule of law through corrections, narcotics control, and access to justice services.

children.name: Office of the Narcotics Control Board
Ministry of Commerce
children.desc: Boosts Thai trade competitiveness, supports exporters, and protects consumers and fair markets.

children.name: Ministry of Labour
children.desc: Improves workforce skills, labour protection, and social security for Thai workers.

children.name: Ministry of Social Development and Human Security
children.desc: Strengthens social safety nets, housing access, and protection for vulnerable communities.

children.name: Department of Social Development and Welfare
Department of Women's Affairs and Family Development
Ministry of Digital Economy and Society
children.desc: Expands nationwide connectivity, digital skills, and cyber resilience for citizens and businesses.

children.name: Ministry of Energy
children.desc: Supports clean energy transition, fuel price stabilisation, and energy efficiency nationwide.

children.name: Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment
children.desc: Preserves forests, protects biodiversity, and manages water and climate resilience initiatives.

children.name: Department of National Parks, Wildlife and Plant Conservation
Ministry of Tourism and Sports
children.desc: Revitalises tourism demand, destination marketing, and high-performance sport development.

children.name: Ministry of Culture
children.desc: Safeguards Thai heritage, creative industries, and cultural exchange programmes.

children.name: Office of Contemporary Art and Culture
Ministry of Foreign Affairs
children.desc: Conducts diplomacy, global cooperation, and overseas Thai citizen services.

children.name: Ministry of Industry
children.desc: Accelerates industrial productivity, investment promotion, and sustainable production standards.

children.name: Department of Primary Industries and Mines
Prime Minister's Office
children.desc: Provides central coordination, strategy, and communications for the Royal Thai Government.

children.name: National Economic and Social Development Council
Central Fund (งบกลาง)
children.desc: Contingency appropriations for emergencies, debt repayments, and nationwide policy priorities.

children.name: Independent Agencies / Other Agencies
children.desc: Constitutional organisations and independent watchdogs that provide oversight and electoral management.
